HOME_DELIVERY.pricing: Cijena dostave za narudžbe do 50,00 € iznosi 4,50 €. Za narudžbe iznad 50,00 € dostava je besplatna.
HOME_DELIVERY.island_surcharge: Dostava na otoke se dodatno naplaćuje prema cjeniku dostavne službe i moguća su duža vremena isporuke.

SUMMARY: DELIVERY OPTIONS: Home delivery, Parcel Locker, and In-store pickup are available. PROVIDERS: GLS is the exclusive courier for home and parcel locker delivery. PRICING: Home delivery costs 4,50 € for orders under 50,00 €, with free shipping for orders above this amount. Parcel locker delivery is currently on a promotional price of 2,50 €. In-store pickup is free. A cash on delivery (COD) surcharge of 1,50 € applies. RESTRICTIONS: Delivery to islands incurs an additional charge and may take longer. NOTABLE FEATURES: Promotional pricing for parcel locker delivery. Two physical store locations in Zagreb for personal pickup. WEBSITE ASSESSMENT: The shipping information is located on the 'Načini plaćanja i dostava' page. The information is clear and concise but lacks details on express or weekend delivery options. Information about parcel lockers is highlighted via a homepage banner.
